name: homogeneously
content:

in a way that consists of parts or people that are similar to each other or are of the same type: I think having a little more diversity would be a benefit to our board, which thus far has been homogeneously composed of rich white men. There are globules of fat that spread homogeneously within the cream when it is at its best. Related word
